name: Vetnio
long_description:
Veterinarians are more overworked than ever. As a result, pets, pet owners, and veterinarians suffer.

By recording veterinary meetings we automate clinical note and email writing. And by leveraging AI in every aspect of admin work we will remove the burden of admin work for veterinarians once and for all.
one_liner: Veterinarians spend 40% of their time on admin work, >20% on noteâ€¦
